thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 19 of 288
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: I've been using this service for over two months now and I'm a satisfied customer. The meals are almost always made in a timely manner within 30-40 minutes total and I've only had a few that I really didn't like at all. My only issue is that the meals can sometimes become repetitive and for the price I am paying I think they need to come up with something else. Also, try to use more family friendly favorites instead of weird meals that seem like they would be found on a menu in an expensive restaurant downtown. Otherwise, great customer service and good food that is healthy!
